thread.title: Cambridge Analytica CEO brags about Trump campaign

title: Cambridge Analytica CEO brags about Trump campaign
text:
Cambridge Analytica CEO brags about Trump campaign 7:09am EDT - 01:18 
The suspended chief executive of Cambridge Analytica said in a secretly recorded video broadcast on Britain's Channel 4 that his political consultancy's online campaign played a decisive role in Donald Trump's 2016 election victory in a secretly recorded video broadcast on Britain's Channel 4. Grace Lee reports.
